title: ‘I Tried to Follow but Pogačar Is Above my Level’: Remco Evenepoel Stands Tall in Early GC Test
content:
The Belgian star survives the first major mountain test of the 2024 Tour and eyes a strong time trial Friday to fuel his podium dreams: 'I'm getting better.'

Read the full article at ‘I Tried to Follow but Pogačar Is Above my Level’: Remco Evenepoel Stands Tall in Early GC Test on Velo.
author: ahood
